items.content_html: A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!
items.title: ChristianE00/AudioKit:  A lightweight, open-source web browser extension for adjusting volume and equalizing sound. Built with performance and efficiency in mind, it's designed to work seamlessly on both high-end and low-end hardware. Contributions and pull requests welcome!

items.content_html: LazyLoad is a lightweight JavaScript library for lazy loading images with various customization options. It improves performance by loading images only when they are about to enter the viewport.
items.title: oguzhan18/easy-lazy: LazyLoad is a lightweight JavaScript library for lazy loading images with various customization options. It improves performance by loading images only when they are about to enter the viewport.

items.content_html: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources. Zero dependencies.
items.title: mediamonks/image-effect-renderer: The image-effect-renderer is lightweight package that allows you to run fragment shaders in your website using WebGL. It can be used to apply effects to HTML image or video sources.  Zero dependencies.
